description: Try our easy to follow Coleslaw & Prawn Bread Sticks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Coleslaw & Prawn Bread Sticks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small carrot, peeled, cut into matchsticks

recipeInstructions.text: Combine cabbage, carrot, onion, sprouts, sesame seeds and coriander in a bowl. Whisk yoghurt, mayonnaise, sauce and lime juice together in a bowl. Reserve 1/3 cup yoghurt dressing and pour the remaining over the cabbage mixture. Season with salt and pepper. Toss to combine.
Trim ends from baguettes and discard. Cut baguettes in half crossways, then cut them in half lengthways down the centre, but not all the way through.
Spread baguettes with reserved dressing, fill with coleslaw and prawns. Serve immediately.
